title: Glass, Nyman - Works for Sax Quartet - Sonic Art Saxophone Qt
description:
Glass: String Quartet No. 3 (arranged for saxophone quartet), Saxophone Quartet, and Nyman: Songs for Tony.

My favourite version of Glass' Saxophone Concerto arranged for saxophone quartet used to be the 2002 edition by the Rascher Saxophone Quartet. Then I heard this 2011 recording by the sonic.art Saxophone Quartet. It is sublime. This disc also contains Glass' 3rd String Quartet, arranged for saxophone quartet, and Michael Nyman's four movement work, "Songs for Tony."

Please enjoy.

MP3 @ 320
